Key Match Events: Austin Reaves had a near triple-double of 35 points, 10 assists and nine rebounds
Jarrett Allen posted a double-double of 27 points and 14 rebounds to go with three blocks, an assist and a steal

The Lakers slashed the lead to five, 107-112, with 2:50 left after a trey by James, but back-to-back-to-back shots by Allen kept Los Angeles at bay, 118-107, with 1:28 remaining, closing the door on the comeback
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers have won their eight straight game and rose to 29-4, while the Lakers dropped to 18-14 for the season
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers have won their eight straight game and rose to 29-4, while the Lakers dropped to 18-14 for the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Darius Garland #10 of the Cleveland Cavaliers takes a shot against Anthony Davis #3 of the Los Angeles Lakers in the second half at Crypto.com Arena on December 31, 2024 in Los Angeles, California.
